caption: Attachments
description: This object contains information about the attachment (e.g. Volume, NetworkInterface, etc).
name: attachment

attach_time.description: Timestamp when the attachment was attached.

instance_uid.description: The unique identifier of the resource that the attachment is attached to (e.g. i-1234567890abcdef0).

is_delete_on_termination.description: Boolean flag indicating if the attachment should be automatically deleted when the instance is terminated.

state.description: The current state of the attachment (e.g. attached, detaching).

uid.description: The unique identifier of the attachment (e.g. vol-1234567890abcdef0, eni-attach-43348162).

uid_alt.description: This is the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.
